text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @ICEgov While the whole world was fighting against Coronavirus, Armenian armed forces attacked territory of Azerbaijan. One general and five officers have been killed in third day of fighting. We protest these violent attacks and illegal occupation of Karabakh
#StopArmenianAgression
